Travel-Hotline.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Built RESTful API endpoints for notifications and trip management.
Constructed backend modules, services, and controllers as part of the REST API design process.
Designed schemas using Prisma and PostgreSQL.
Integrated Google Location API for geolocation features.
Documented code and automated deployments with CI/CD pipelines.

Aquillius Corporation.title: Team Lead / R&D Intern
responsibilities: Led a cross-functional team through product development.
Managed budget and materials using MS Excel.
Conducted research and synthesized findings for design decisions.
Produced presentations and reports to communicate progress.
Streamlined development phase by employing ideation techniques such as storyboarding and mind mapping.
achievements: Secured $10,000 grand prize in a pitch competition.
Ranked 1st in popular vote for innovation.

85c Bakery and Cafe.title: Shift Lead
responsibilities: Oversaw daily operations and delegated tasks for efficient workflow.
Trained and mentored new employees.
Optimized team performance through targeted support.
Prepared sales reports for management review.
Diagnosed and resolved POS (Point of Sale) technical issues

KFC.title: Cashier
responsibilities: Processed customer transactions accurately and efficiently.
Provided friendly and professional customer service, addressing guest inquiries and and resolving issues.
Maintained cleanliness of dining and counter areas to meet health and safety standards.
Balanced cash drawer and reported discrepancies.
Promoted new menu items and upsold products.
Followed company procedures for food safety, cash handling, and customer service best practices.
